questions.question_text: Which is a low risk change that has been pre-approved so that no additional authorization is needed?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Think "pre-approved and low-risk" when identifying a standard change.
A is correct.

Standard Change
A low-risk, pre-authorized change that is well understood and fully documented, and can be implemented without needing additional authorization. Is often initiated as a service request, but may also be an operational change.
